mapper.select: SELECT count(id) AS bingCount, SUM(IF(parent1_id = #{userId}, 1, 0)) AS paoBingCount, SUM(IF(parent2_id = #{userId}, 1, 0)) AS qiBingCount, SUM(IF(parent3_id = #{userId}, 1, 0)) AS buBingCount FROM tb_user WHERE (parent1_id = #{userId} OR parent2_id = #{userId} OR parent3_id = #{userId}) AND `status` = 0 AND mobile is not null

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IF(parent1_id = #{userId}, return1_money, 0)), 0) AS paoBingMoney, IFNULL(SUM(IF(parent2_id = #{userId}, return2_money, 0)), 0) AS qiBingMoney, IFNULL(SUM(IF(parent3_id = #{userId}, return3_money, 0)), 0) AS buBingMoney, IFNULL(SUM(IF(parent1_id = #{userId}, money, 0)), 0) AS paoBingMoneyTotal, IFNULL(SUM(IF(parent2_id = #{userId}, money, 0)), 0) AS qiBingMoneyTotal, IFNULL(SUM(IF(parent3_id = #{userId}, money, 0)), 0) AS buBingMoneyTotal FROM tb_trade WHERE (parent1_id = #{userId} OR parent2_id = #{userId} OR parent3_id = #{userId}) AND `status` = 1 AND balance_status = 2 AND sell_type = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_trade SET return1_money = if(parent1_id is null, 0, money * 0), return2_money = if(parent2_id is null, 0, money * 0), return3_money = if(parent3_id is null, 0, money * 0), balance_status = 1 WHERE `status` = 1 AND balance_status = 0 AND sell_type = 1 AND model = 2
mapper.select: SELECT sum(return_money_total) AS returnMoneyTotal, id FROM ( SELECT sum(return1_money) AS return_money_total, parent1_id AS id FROM tb_trade WHERE balance_status = 1 AND parent1_id is not null AND model = 2 GROUP BY parent1_id UNION SELECT sum(return2_money) AS return_money_total, parent2_id AS id FROM tb_trade WHERE balance_status = 1 AND parent2_id is not null AND model = 2 GROUP BY parent2_id UNION SELECT sum(return3_money) AS return_money_total, parent3_id AS id FROM tb_trade WHERE balance_status = 1 AND parent3_id is not null AND model = 2 GROUP BY parent3_id) t GROUP BY id
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_trade SET balance_status = 2 WHERE `status` = 1 AND balance_status = 1 AND sell_type = 1 AND model = 2
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IF(parent1_id = #{userId}, return1_money, 0)), 0) AS paoBingMoney, IFNULL(SUM(IF(parent2_id = #{userId}, return2_money, 0)), 0) AS qiBingMoney, IFNULL(SUM(IF(parent3_id = #{userId}, return3_money, 0)), 0) AS buBingMoney, IFNULL(SUM(IF(parent1_id = #{userId}, money, 0)), 0) AS paoBingMoneyTotal, IFNULL(SUM(IF(parent2_id = #{userId}, money, 0)), 0) AS qiBingMoneyTotal, IFNULL(SUM(IF(parent3_id = #{userId}, money, 0)), 0) AS buBingMoneyTotal FROM tb_trade WHERE (parent1_id = #{userId} OR parent2_id = #{userId} OR parent3_id = #{userId}) AND `status` = 1 AND balance_status = 2 AND sell_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}

SELECT id, chn_name AS chnName, user_header AS userHeader, register_time AS registerTime, if(parent1_id = #{id}, 1, if(parent2_id = #{id}, 2, 3)) AS corpsType FROM tb_user WHERE (parent1_id = #{id} OR parent2_id = #{id} OR parent3_id = #{id}) AND mobile IS NOT NULL ORDER BY register_time DESC

SELECT U1.id AS id, U1.chn_name AS chnName, U1.mobile AS mobile, COUNT(U2.id) AS parent2Total FROM tb_user U1 LEFT JOIN tb_user U2 ON U1.id = U2.parent2_id WHERE (U1.parent2_id = #{userId}) GROUP BY U1.id;
